Class OpQuerySamples

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.OpController<MndotProperty>
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.mndot.Op170
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.mndot.OpQuerySamples
Direct Known Subclasses:
OpQuerySamples30Sec, OpQuerySamples5Min
public abstract class OpQuerySamples extends Op170
Query sample operations are for collecting 30-second or 5-minute binned sample data.
Author:
Douglas Lau
